name: My so-called future girlfriend (미래의 여친님이 나에게 인사를 건네왔다)
description: This game is a male-oriented visual novel that features text, illustration, and voice.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Inten Pentium 3 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 32MB Graphic Card Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Core2 DUO or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64MB Graphic Card Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound
